itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by stand up comedian Brent Pella to talk about the comedy culture today, mask mandates going back up in Los Angeles, Brent's sketch comedy videos on California governor Gavin Newsome, and why people in comedy do...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by stand up comedian Brent Pella to talk about the comedy culture today, mask mandates going back up in Los Angeles, Brent's sketch comedy videos on California governor Gavin Newsome, and why people in comedy don't go after targets on the left like AOC and Kamala Harris.
